name: Panic Picnic!!
description:
How to Play:  Use either the arrow keys or WASD to move around.
  •  WS + UP/Down to move
  • AD + Left/Right to rotate
Collect the food items that have spawned in, avoiding contact with the animals. Be careful! The animals follow you. Credit to:
  • Kenney UI Pack, from Kenney.nl
  • Kenney Platformer Pack, from Kenney.nl
  • Unity Create with Code Lesson 2 pack
  • SFX and Music made by creator, Carley Thompson
